an10.146:1.1: “I will teach you the dark path and the bright path. …
an10.146:1.3: And what is the dark path?
an10.146:1.4: Wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong immersion, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.
an10.146:1.5: This is called the dark path.
an10.146:1.6: And what is the bright path?
an10.146:1.7: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
an10.146:1.8: This is called the bright path.”
